== Ubuntu browser start page translations ==

This page describes the way we handle translations for the <nowiki>[[http://start.ubuntu.com/10.04/|Ubuntu browser start page]]</nowiki>.

=== Translation ===

* '''Translators:'''
** You can start translating the browser start page into your language <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu-start-page|here]]</nowiki>.
** You can also <nowiki>[[#Bugs|report any bugs]]</nowiki> you find or ask your questions on the <nowiki>[[..-..-Contact#UbuntuTranslators|translators mailing list]]</nowiki>.
* '''Maintainers:'''
** Translations are automatically committed daily on the <nowiki>[[https://code.edge.launchpad.net/~adiroiban/ubuntu-start-page/trunk-l10n|translations branch]]</nowiki> (`lp:ubuntu-start-page/trunk-l10n`)
** In order to create the translated HTML pages from the sources, you'll have to:
## <code>bzr merge lp:ubuntu-start-page/trunk-l10n</code>
## '''WORK IN PROGRESS''': <code>./build/translate-9.04.sh</code>
## '''WORK IN PROGRESS''': You might need to rename the Turkish and Polish translations' extensions to `.tu` and `.po` respectively. Otherwise the server thinks they are troff and perl files and will not serve them properly. 
## Upload the translated files to the server 

=== Development ===

==== Code ====

You can <nowiki>[[http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~canonical-webmonkeys/ubuntu-start-page/trunk/files|browse the source code]]</nowiki> for the development focus branch or get a copy of the branch using the command:
<pre>
bzr branch lp:ubuntu-start-page
</pre>

If you see any bugs and you'd like to contribute fixing them, please create your own branch from <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/ubuntu-start-page|trunk]]</nowiki>.

==== Bugs ====
Any bugs related to the Ubuntu browser start page are tracked in <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-start-page|Lauchpad]]</nowiki>.

Feel free to <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-start-page/+filebug|report]]</nowiki> any problems you might find.

==== Community testing ====

Current, unreleased translations are available for testing <nowiki>[[http://l10n.ubuntu.tla.ro/startpage-10.04/|here]]</nowiki>. If you want to request an update for your language, please do so on the <nowiki>[[..-..-Contact#UbuntuTranslators|translators mailing list]]</nowiki>
